headers.list-id: Desktop bug tracker changes - HIGH VOLUME <desktop-bugs.lists.ubuntu.com>

body.para: I found the patch was already discussed in Bug #20284 comment 10. This issue may be a duplicate of the referenced bug #12454, which was fixed and re-appeared?! Funnily the regression pops up every some months, as the upstream bug is from 2001!
body.footer: -- Desktop icons are allowed to overlap https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/40872 You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Desktop Bugs, which is a direct subscriber.
